channel.title: Go Humble! RSS GAMES
channel.description: Awesome RSS Feeds about HumbleBundle games bundles!

item.title: Wholesome Snack 2024
item.description: Cute, calm, and curated for you
item.content:encoded:
Looking to unwind with some cozy games? The Wholesome Snack Bundle celebrates the Wholesome Snack indie game showcase and offers a selection of titles brimming with charm. Step into the paws of an adventurous feline in Little Kitty, Big City. Immerse yourself in a world where farming meets magic in Fae Farm, and relax to the soothing vibes of Spirit City: Lofi Sessions. These games—and more—invite you to explore the softer, kinder side of gaming and help support World Central Kitchen with your purchase!

Wholesome Snack: The Game Awards Edition returns December 10, 2024 starting at 12:00 PM Pacific, 3:00 PM Eastern. The digital showcase will be presented via YouTube and Twitch livestreams.

item.title: Disney Classics Black Friday Humble Bundle
item.description: A vault full of Disney Classics
item.content:encoded: Journey into the wonderful past with these beloved Disney franchises. Build your favorite heroes in LEGO games featuring Star Wars, Indiana Jones, and the Pirates of the Caribbean. Speaking of pirates, join Guybrush Threepwood in a collection of Monkey Island adventures or travel to a galaxy far, far away with Star Wars Knights of the Old Republic and Republic Commando. Delve into a deep catalog of Disney Classics and help support the Starlight Children's Foundation with your purchase!

item.title: Rawcember to Remember
item.content:encoded: Ready to play something new? The world of indie gaming is vast, deep, and bursting with amazing titles. Publishers like Raw Fury release amazing indie games that span a variety of genres—from serious shooters to musical puzzle games. Get awesome indie titles like Dome Keeper Deluxe Edition, Kingdom Two Crowns: Norse Lands Edition, Snufkin: Melody of Moominvalley, and more with Raw Fury’s RAWcember to Remember bundle! Experience new games and help support Save the Children with your purchase.

item.title: Sci-Fi Shooters
item.content:encoded: From the depths of space to a galaxy far, far away. Get award-winning and timeless sci-fi shooters with this bundle of awesome games! Use the Force in Star Wars: Dark Forces Remaster, experience an all-time classic in 2023’s System Shock, send demons back to hell in DOOM, and more. Play some of the greatest titles of the genre, and help support One Tree Planted and Cool Effect with your purchase!

item.title: The Telltale Collection
item.content:encoded: Explore captivating renditions of your favorite franchises with our Telltale Collection. Create your own adventures set within the worlds of Batman, The Walking Dead, The Expanse, and more. The Telltale Collection features iconic titles like The Expanse: A Telltale Series, The Walking Dead: The Telltale Definitive Series, and Batman: The Enemy Within. Lose yourself in Telltale Games’ signature choose-your-own-adventure style today and help support Save The Children with your purchase.
